text: The Betsy is a 1978 American sports romantic drama movie directed by Daniel Petrie and based on the novel of the same name by Harold Robbins. It stars Laurence Olivier, Tommy Lee Jones, Robert Duvall, Katharine Ross, Jane Alexander and Lesley-Anne Down and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Daniel Petrie Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies set in Michigan Category:Auto racing movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1978 romantic drama movies
title: The Betsy
